thoughts.text: I'm curious about what hyperlinks are present on a website. I can use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a list of all the hyperlinks on a given website.
thoughts.reasoning: Knowing what hyperlinks are present on a website can help me understand the structure and content of the website. This information can be useful in a variety of contexts, such as web scraping or website analysis.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a list of all the hyperlinks on a website
- Review the list to gain insights into the website's structure and content
thoughts.criticism: The list of hyperlinks may be very long, making it difficult to parse and analyze. Additionally, some of the hyperlinks may be irrelevant or unimportant.
thoughts.speak: I have decided to use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to learn more about the hyperlinks on a website.
